Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
org.project.ClientPack.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, ConnectionInterface, RMIClientInterface
public class RMIClient extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ConnectionInterface, RMIClientInterface
RMI client

    • notifyInitialGameView

      public void notifyInitialGameView(String[][] board, List<Integer> pointStack, HashMap<String,String[][]> gridsView, HashMap<String,String[]> tilesView, HashMap<String,Integer> pGoalView, List<Integer> cGoalView) throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to send all initialized game parameters to the client
      Specified by:
      notifyInitialGameView in interface RMIClientInterface
      Parameters:
      board - represents the game board
      pointStack - represents scores for common goals
      gridsView - represents each player's grid
      tilesView - the chosen tiles are present in this list
      pGoalView - in this list there are the personal goals fished
      cGoalView - in this list there are the common goals fished
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • notifyPick

      public void notifyPick(String[][] board, String[] tilesView, String playername) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:
      notifyPick in interface RMIClientInterface
      Parameters:
      board - new game board
      tilesView - the chosen tiles are present in this list
      playername - player's username
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      Parameters:

    • isConnected

      public void isConnected() throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to accept that the client is always connected. When the exception returns it understands that the client has disconnected and therefore removes the player from the list of online players
      Specified by:
      isConnected in interface RMIClientInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when something goes wrong with the connection

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      method called by ServerRmiHandler when server crush. This method close the connection and the client.
